ComicInfo.Title: Goin' South
ComicInfo.Summary:
WHAT ARE LITTLE BOYS MADE OF? - Part 1 of 5. Static takes on Joyride, while a brutal attack reveals Rick's secret.
Larry's car gets stolen by someone called Joyride, who can control cars. Static remembers a former encounter involving Joyride where he lost him after a high-speed chase. Static lost Joyride and someone got hurt in the process. Chuck continues to lay into Rick with gay-based jokes. Rick is getting fed up with the whole thing. Virgil plans on how to catch Joyride as he works at this part-time job. Static confronts Joyride at a car show. Static tricks Joyride into getting out of the car and catches him. Static then stops a brutal beating and finds that his friend Rick is really gay!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-21 06:43:25. [CVDB39810]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Wilfred Santiago, John Paul Leon, Wilfred Santiago
ComicInfo.Characters: Frieda Goren, Joyride, Larry Wade, Rick Stone, Sharon Hawkins, Static
